title: Rocksville's Terror
description: Rocksville's Terror (MM Romance Thriller)In the small town of Rocksville, Michael lives with his parents. He helps his father by tending to the farmlands they own. It had been years since his brother, Steven, had moved to the neighboring town. Michael misses him dearly, and Steven only seems to visit during the holidays. But when tragedy strikes home, Michael doesn't know who to turn to.Steven, busy with work and having little time to spare for his brother, carries a secret with him that he's been holding for many years now, even before Michael's birth. He grows tired of harboring this secret but doesn't think it's time to confess yet to his brother. But when he receives a phone call from Michael about tragic events, Steven has to head back home. There he will have to face the past all over again.
author: Darina Smith
